department.en: Graduate Institute of Network Learning Technology

goal.ch:
本課程教導學生將能夠熟練運用數位工具平台設計具社會、文化或環境議題的實境遊戲，並掌握提示詞工程與思考鏈技巧，提升與AI同伴的互動效果。學生將能夠進行實地調查與需求分析，將場域需求有效轉化為遊戲設計元素，並具備設計並迭代遊戲機制與故事情節的能力，從而提升遊戲的互動性與玩家體驗。此外，學生將能夠進行遊戲測試與反饋收集，並根據回饋優化遊戲設計。在專題展示中，學生將能夠清晰地展示其遊戲設計成果，並進行深入的反思與總結，為未來的教學設計工作打下堅實的基礎。

1.培養學生運用數位工具平台設計具社會、文化或環境議題的實境遊戲能力。
2.教授學生有效利用AI同伴進行設計輔助，提升創意思維與技術應用能力。
3.透過實地調查與需求分析，讓學生理解並應用場域需求於遊戲設計中。
goal.en:
This course teaches students to design reality games that address social issues using digital tools. Students will learn to leverage AI for design, conduct field research, and iterate on game mechanics. By the end of the course, students will be able to create engaging games and present their work effectively.

Focus on AI and game design: This course empowers students to harness AI to create immersive games that address real-world issues.
Focus on field research and user experience: Students will learn to conduct field research and design games that cater to specific user needs.
Focus on iterative design: Students will learn to refine their game designs by conducting playtesting and gathering feedback.

outline.ch: 專題目標：本專題旨在讓學生運用所學的遊戲設計理論與實務技能，結合特定的社會、文化或環境議題，設計並開發具教育意義與互動性的實境遊戲。透過實地調查、需求分析、遊戲機制與故事情節設計、測試與反饋收集，學生將完成一個完整的遊戲設計專案，提升其創意思維、技術應用能力及跨領域協作能力。
outline.en: This project aims to enable students to apply their acquired game design theories and practical skills to design and develop reality games with educational value and interactivity, focusing on specific social, cultural, or environmental issues. Through field research, needs analysis, game mechanics and storyline design, testing, and feedback collection, students will complete a comprehensive game design project, enhancing their creativity, technical application, and cross-disciplinary collaboration skills.
